Containers.Name: Checksum Suite
Containers.Description: This plugin automatically creates md5/sha/blake2 checksums for new files on the array. Check for corruption. Beta: create and repair corruptions using par2 sets
Containers.Requires: **Nvidia Driver plugin** (nVidia Support) *or* **Intel GPU TOP plugin** (Intel Support) *or* **AMD Driver** and **RadeonTop plugins** (AMD Support)
